value:
/** READ ME: Long-Range Growth: Economic Development in the Global Network of Air Links ****

The do files contain the code to run the regressions in Tables 1-8, i.e. all regressions excluding the online appendix.
The data files include a subset of all the variables used: Because some of the key data is proprietary, in particular data acquired from ICAO and Orbis, these variables contain missing values. 
Upon provision of evidence of access to the relevant databases, we will share the corresponding variables.
